name: Potatoes and Sausages
keywords: fall, main course, portuguese chouriço, potato
recipeIngredient: 15 medium-size potatoes (5 to 5 1/2 pounds), peeled and left whole
1/2 pound country bacon cut in 1 1/2-inch dice
1 teaspoon red hot peppers or hot pepper sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange potatoes and sausage in 9-by-14-inch casserole. Sprinkle with garlic, salt, bacon, hot peppers and paprika. Pour 1 cup wine over all.
Cover with foil and cook in oven about an hour, checking occasionally. After an hour, add more wine and cook, uncovered, for 20 minutes, until potatoes are browned.
